name: Dancing Blade
description:
A skill based 2D platformer where you must maneuver yourself through the air by dancing. 

Rearrange your dance moves to create your own dance sequences, which you can use to clear levels.

Controls:
Arrow keys to move
SPACE + Arrow key to dance

Dance moves:
Forward Swing- the dancer slashes the air, propelling them forwards
Whirlpool - the dancer spins upwards, gaining vertical momentum
Dash - The dancer dashes to a direction specified by ARROW KEYS or WASD
Wall Slash - (CAN ONLY BE USED WHEN CLOSE TO A WALL AND FACING IT) The dancer slashes against a wall, propelling them away from the wall 

Programming and Level Design:

Billythekidzz, dogiordano

Audio: 

CDWpod

Created for Weekly Game Jam 145 with the theme: Dance
